description.zh_CN:
1. 启动思源笔记之后，自动开启今天的笔记
2. 工具栏提供下拉框，快速查看今天的笔记并打开
3. atrl+右键选择块，可以将块移动到别的笔记文档下
description.en_US:
1. After starting siyuan-note, automatically open today's notes
2. The toolbar provides a drop-down box to quickly view today's notes and open them
3. atrl+right click to select the block, you can move the block to daily note under another notebook
